name: pnp-list-formatting-photo-gallery-description-link-like
title: Photo Gallery with Description, Link and Likes
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates formatting a document library gallery view into a photo gallery showing title, description, hyperlink and likes.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates formatting a document library gallery view into a photo gallery showing title, description, hyperlink and likes.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
